DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Sybase(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Sybase(3)

NAME

DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Sybase - Base class for drivers using DBD::Sybase

DESCRIPTION

This is the base class/dispatcher for Storage's designed to work with DBD::Sybase
